mention.text: an '' international asset '' is of no avail What merits attention is that this was not the first time Patten

an '' international asset '' in a speech in Washington To echo this assertion , British Foreign Secretary Douglas Hurd said in both Singapore and Jakarta last July that Hong Kong had become a '' political city
the Chinese people , who refuse to be bullied again
